title: dpop token endpoint
description: The DPoP proof JWT used for requesting to the token endpoint of the authorization server the issuing of an access token bounded to the public key specified within the JWK header of the DPoP proof JWT

jti.description: Unique identifier; can be used to prevent the JWT from being replayed (allows a token to be used only once)

iat.description: The UNIX Timestamp at which the JWT was issued; can be used to determine age of the JWT

htu.description: The HTTP target URI of the request to which the JWT is attached, without query and fragment parts

htm.description: The value of the HTTP method to which the JWT is attached
